wikipedia_page.main: Tony Lloyd (born 3 December 1956) is a former British professional tennis player.

response: | 1979 ||  Jean-Louis Haillet   Gilles Moretton ||  John Lloyd   Tony Lloyd || 7–6, 7–6
Jean-Louis Haillet /  Gilles Moretton defeated  John Lloyd /  Tony Lloyd 7–6, 7–6
Jean-Louis Haillet and Gilles Moretton won in the final 7–6, 7–6 against John Lloyd and Tony Lloyd.

He also partnered his brother at Grand Slam level. One of their three Grand Slam appearances together was at the 1980 Wimbledon Championships, where they lost a five-set match to another pair of brothers, John and Tony Lloyd. Gattiker played in five further Grand Slam tournaments, as either a singles of doubles player, but was never able to progress past the first round.
Tony Lloyd (born 1950) is a British Labour Party politician.
Tony Lloyd may also refer to:
*Tony Lloyd, Baron Lloyd of Berwick (born 1929), retired English judge
*Tony Lloyd, Baron Lloyd of Berwick (born 1929), British judge
